result.execSummary:
The defendant Venton L. SPEIDEL Jr. was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Venton L. SPEIDEL Jr.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
The State moves to amend count 1 to county ordinance disorderly conduct, contrary to Manitowoc County Ordinance 6.19.  Motion granted.
State moves to dismiss and read in count 2.  Motion granted.
NO CONTEST plea entered to the amended charge.  Convicted.
The Court imposes a $200.00 forfeiture plus costs, total of $456.50.  $500.00 cash bail applied.  $43.50 balance is returned to Cindy Howard by check instruction no: CR 45.

Notice of Motion to Suppress Statements of Defendant; Motion to Suppress Statements of Defendant; Notice of Motion; Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
Cover letter.

Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 03-13-15 at 4:00 p.m.  
Minutes.

RE:  Terri Speidel, on 12-28-14.
Initial appearance is set for 02-09-15 at 1:30 p.m.

ADDRESS INFO for Venton L. SPEIDEL Jr.
Current: 1736 24th Street, Two Rivers, WI 54241 United States  (Effective: 01-02-2015)
Prior: 211 Randolph Street, Mishicot, WI 54228

$500.00 cash bail and bail bond furnished at time of arrest on 12-28-14 and delivered to Clerk of Court office by Sheriff's Department.
